means: 最大程度地，最大限度地

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"最远的"之意。
means: extreme ： 普通用词，指最远的意思时，与farthest和outermost含义相当。
utmost ： 较正式用词，指最远部分或最远地区。
outermost ： 指离中心最远的或指一个平面或物体最外边的部分。
farthest是far的最高级形式，指最大的距离。
furthest与farthest相比，除指数量或程度上的最多或最大。

sentence.Network_en: the house farthest away from the road
sentence.Network_cn: 离这条路最远的那栋房子

sentence.Network_en: The farthest way about is the nearest way home.
sentence.Network_cn: 遥程路反近,捷径常误人.

sentence.Network_en: Of all the students, I ran farthest.
sentence.Network_cn: 在所有学生中, 我跑得最远.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 八年级上册英语单词 ... near 近的、靠近的、接近的 farthest 最远的（地） province 省份.
求江苏牛津英语9A的单词表_百度知道 ... 42 farther adv. 更远 43 farthest adv. 最远 44 viewer n. 电视观众.
214 副词的比较 ... (好地)→ better→best。 (距离)→ farthest (程度)→ furthest.
关于英语拉.._百度知道 ... B than 与比较级连用： farthest (表距离) furthest (表程度).

list.abs: Internet research uncovers one poll that suggests that many people , like your boyfriend , head to the farthest cubicle . another site claims that the nearest stall is the least used .互联网上进行的一项调查显示，许多人会走向最远处的隔间，比如你的男朋友。另一个网站则宣称，最近的隔间最少被使用。

at its farthest end , three glaciers meet to dump their effluvia into the milky grey glacial water , launching massive igloo icebergs lake with thunderous splashes .在最远的一端，三条冰河汇聚到一处，将硕大的冰块注入奶白色的河流中，冰块互相碰撞，水花四溅，形成令人叹为观止的奇景。
It is the fourth farthest planet from the sun ., 它是离太阳第四远的行星.
Tagore said that the world's farthest distance is not life and death , but I stand before you , you do not know that I love you .泰戈尔说，世界上最远的距离不是生与死，而是我站在你面前，你却不知道我爱你。

entry.def: Farthest is a superlative form of far .

means.word_mean: 2. (comparatives of `far') most remote in space or time or order;

sentences.sentence: "don't go beyond the farthermost (or furthermost) tree"

means.word_mean: 1. to the greatest distance in space or time (`farthest' is used more often than `furthest' in this physical sense);

sentences.sentence: "chose the farthest seat from the door"

means.word_mean: 2. to the greatest degree or extent or most advanced stage (`furthest' is used more often than `farthest' in this abstract sense);

sentences.sentence: "went the furthest of all the children in her education"

auth_sentence.content: This is the farthest thing from a big surprise.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is the farthest thing from a big surprise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is the farthest thing from a big surprise.

auth_sentence.content: I had reached the farthest point of navigation.
auth_sentence.res_content: I had reached the farthest point of navigation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I had reached the farthest point of navigation.

auth_sentence.content: She uprooted the family from Kent...and went to farthest Pembrokeshire.
auth_sentence.res_content: She uprooted the family from Kent...and went to farthest Pembrokeshire.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She uprooted the family from Kent...and went to farthest Pembrokeshire.

sentences.cn: 遥程路反近,捷径常误人。

sentences.en: Of all the students, I ran farthest.
sentences.cn: 在所有学生中,我跑得最远。

means.word_mean: 最大程度地;最大限度地

sentences.en: the graduates who have gone the farthest in their careers
sentences.cn: 那些在事业上成就最卓著的毕业生
